text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008/version/20221231
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/clinical-term
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/icd-o-morphology
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/icd-o-topography
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/cancer-t-category
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/cancer-n-category
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/cancer-m-category

name: ConditionCodeVS
title: Condition Code
description: This value set defines set of codes for Condition Code.
